# Secret Santa Application - Copilot Instructions

This is a Python Flask web application for organizing Secret Santa gift exchanges.

## Project Features
- Web interface for entering participant emails
- Random assignment algorithm that prevents self-assignments
- Email notifications via Gmail SMTP
- Simple HTML/CSS/JS frontend
- Python Flask backend

## Development Guidelines
- Use Python Flask for the web server
- Implement robust randomization logic
- Handle email sending errors gracefully
- Keep the UI simple and intuitive
- Follow security best practices for email configuration
